item.title: Dubai Government to Sponsor Upcoming Digital Currency Conference - CoinDesk
item.description:
Dubai Government to Sponsor Upcoming Digital Currency Conference - CoinDesk

Dubai is set to play host to a conference on digital currencies later this month, an event that comes several months after a government-backed blockchain effort was first unveiled.

item.title: UK Banks' Obsoleteness at Root of Small BTC/GBP Trading Volume
item.description:
UK Banks' Obsoleteness at Root of Small BTC/GBP Trading Volume

Despite being the fifth largest economy in the world, the United Kingdom has a relatively small BTC/GBP trading volume ratio. Banks refusal to deal with Bitcoin companies is at the heart of the problem.

item.title: The Father of Futarchy Has an Idea to Reshape DAO Governance - CoinDesk
item.description:
The Father of Futarchy Has an Idea to Reshape DAO Governance - CoinDesk

Sixteen years after Robin Hanson published a seminal paper on using prediction markets to inform governance decisions, his ideas have found a home in the Ethereum community. The associate professor of economics at George Mason University and researcher at Oxford's Future of Humanity institute first coined the term "Futarchy" to describe a new form of governance that uses data from prediction markets to provide input.

item.title: Lisk Expands Team Heading Into May 24 Launch - Bitcoinist.net
item.description:
Lisk Expands Team Heading Into May 24 Launch - Bitcoinist.net

Lisk has greatly expanded its team in anticipation of its launch on May 24, 2016. By hiring two new community members and recruiting a PR firm, the team hopes to increase awareness about their project. Disclaimer: This article was provided by Bitcoin PR Buzz.

item.title: Wall Street Blockchain Alliance Eyes Economic Empowerment
item.description:
Wall Street Blockchain Alliance Eyes Economic Empowerment

The Wall Street Blockchain Alliance, a non-profit advocacy group for distributed ledger technology has announced two new working committees, each chaired by noteworthy industry experts. One of the committees is working toward economic inclusion of the unbanked.

item.title: Peter Todd Voices Concerns Over Bitcoin Foundation Politics
item.description:
Peter Todd Voices Concerns Over Bitcoin Foundation Politics

A new email has been sent out by the Bitcoin Foundation, which has caused a lot of confusion and disgruntlement among Bitcoin experts. Peter Todd responded on Twitter stressing how he's not a Bitcoin Foundation member and doesn't wish to be represented by them.

item.title: DASH Technical Analysis for 05/23/2016 - Market Trading Above 0.0175 Pivot Zone
item.description:
DASH Technical Analysis for 05/23/2016 - Market Trading Above 0.0175 Pivot Zone

DASH has been in bullish mode since the beginning of the month and the market has overcome a number of significant pivot zones so far. The 0.0175 area - which acted as resistance towards the end of March and early April - is now acting as support.

item.title: VR platform Voxelus sets up foundation to promote in-game cryptocurrency adoption
item.description:
VR platform Voxelus sets up foundation to promote in-game cryptocurrency adoption

Voxelus CEO Martin Repetto said in the press release that the Foundation will be initially endowed with 5 million VOX, with up to 10 million more VOX allocated in the future to support its mission.

item.title: Research and Markets releases Global Digital Coin Market 2016-2020 report
item.description:
Research and Markets releases Global Digital Coin Market 2016-2020 report

Market research store Research and Markets has released its new report on digital currencies, "Global Digital Coin Market 2016-2020," projecting a 7.33% market growth within the digital coin space...
